{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Buffalo |model=GP03 |revision= |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=11/30/2011 |manuf_country=China |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=mobile hotspot |fcc_id=FDI-04610108-0 |ic_id= |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp= |pwr_conn=USB Female Micro-B |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Marvell |cpu1_model=88CP920 |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1= |fla1_brand=Hynix |fla1_model=H8BCS0SJ0BCA |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1= |ram1_brand= |ram1_model= |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module=AzureWave AW-NH387L |wi1_module_if=SDIO (module) |wi1_chip1_brand=Marvell |wi1_chip1_model=88W8787 |wi1_chip2_brand= |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=1 |wi1_rxchains=1 |wi1_sstreams=1 |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none=true |eth_cpu= |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed= |lan_ports= |wan_ports= |flags=battery,4G (HSPA+) |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=GP03-4CE676XXXXXX |default_ssid_regex=^GP03-[A-F0-9]{12}$ |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui=4C:E6:76 |oui_eth= |default_ch= }} There is a '''Qualcomm''' MDM8220 on-board.
The default SSID pattern for this device seems to be '''GP03-4CE676XXXXXX''' where '''XXXXXX''' is remainder of the MAC address after the 4C:E6:76 OUI. :The default network password (WEP..) appears to be a 5 digit number.
